comment: Smart Data Models - Mapping of ACRIS data model MeasurementTimePeriod adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ACRIS/master/MeasurementTimePeriod/schema.json
description: Property. The time period over which a Measurement is taken.

contents.name: EndTime
contents.comment: The date and time at the end of the time period over which a Measurement is taken. Date time should be UTC, compliant with ISO 8601 format (e.g. 2023-04-20T11:54:59Z)
